column4: vim does have a diff feature.  I use it daily and it's awesome.  ":h diffthis"
it's not a compile option
It is.  ":version" -> it's the +diff option.
doesn't show as a compile time optoion in 6.3, but I'll take your word
Ah.  Yes.  It's 7.0 or later.  But 7.0 is about 5 years old, isn't it.
#ubuntu-packaging
#ubuntu-motu
Thanks.  It wasn't showing up in my /list...?
on the local host, try to login to alice or "su - alice"
you shouldn't be able to ssh as root - the root account is disabled
I can log as alice locally. (su - alice)
are you using ubuntu ?
do you have no non-privileged users on your system ?
that's not what I asked
do you have no other non-privileged accounts on the machine ?
There are other users than alice, yes.
ok, so become one, then "su - alice" and check the password
It works.
so you know the problem is with ssh
check the ssh logs
no
